full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DMIGS BRTZE MA'I 'BRU 'GREL CHA DGU CAN GYI SPYI GTZUG GI YID BZHIN NOR BU ZHES BYA BA DANG, DMIGS BRTZE MA'I RTZA 'GREL GSUM BRTZEGS RIN CHEN GSUM GYI PHRENG BA ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, , *, ,DMIGS BRTZE MA'I 'BRU 'GREL CHA DGU CAN GYI SPYI GTZUG GI YID BZHIN NOR BU ZHES BYA BA NI,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004B ZHES DMIGS BRTZE MA'I TSIGS BCAD GCIG LA SKYE BU GSUM GYI LAM RIM, GRUB MTHA' BZHI, SDE SNOD GSUM, PHAR PHYIN DRUG ,SANGS RGYAS SA'I YON TAN SOGS MDOR NA CHOS KYI PHUNG PO BRGYAD KHRI BZHI STONG 'DU BA'I TSUL CHA DGU CAN GYI SPYI GTZUG GI YID BZHIN NOR BU ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, CHOS SMRA BA'I BTZUN PA DGE SLONG YE SHES DON GRUB BSTAN PA'I RGYAL MTSAN GYIS ZVE LA SHAR SHAR DU SMRA BA'I YI GE PA NI CHOS TSUL DON DU GNYER BA 'JAM DBYANGS 'PHRIN LAS SO, ,
author_simple: YE SHES DON GRUB BSTAN PA'I RGYAL MTSAN,
